alert.note: Alert for Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued May 14 at 5:41PM MST until May 14 at 6:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 630 PM MST. * At 540 PM MST, a wall of dust was located near Casa Grande, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Less than three miles visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 180 and 205. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 155 and 178. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 124 and 148. Locations impacted include... Casa Grande, Coolidge, Arizona City, La Palma, Blackwater, Toltec, Arizola, Randolph, Coolidge Airport, Stanfield, Valley Farms and Sacaton. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
